alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 8:49AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL AFFECT PARTS OF JEFFERSON...OSWEGO... AND LEWIS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A lake effect snow band which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This lake effect snow band is producing extremely heavy snow at the rate of 3 or more inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 845 AM EST, a lake effect snow band streaming in off Lake Ontario was nearly stationary. The axis of the band extended from Sandy Creek and Adams eastwarde to Copenhagen, Osceola and Highmarket. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Sandy Island Beach State Park, Stony Point, Lowville, Pulaski, Adams, Highmarket, Adams Center, Henderson Harbor, Barnes Corners, Whetstone Gulf State Park, Southwick Beach State Park, Richland, Denmark, New Bremen, Watson, Martinsburg, Henderson, Smithville, Rodman, and Orwell. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 37 and 44. SAFETY INFO... The snow will accumulate so rapidly that it will be extremely difficult for the road crews to keep the roads clear. &&
